price: اّيا له ټولو (باطلو) معبودانو يې يو معبود [حق] جوړ كړى؟ دا خو يقيني ډېر عجيبه شى دى.
arabic: أَجَعَلَ ٱلۡأٓلِهَةَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدًاۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٌ عُجَابٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: ajaʿala al-ālihata ilāhan wāḥidan inna hādhā lashayon ʿujābun
